item.title: Continously updated crime report draft criminal RICO case targeting McDonald‚Äôs Corporation and its accomplices
item.description: Excerpts from Draft Number 27. The content I am currently publishing online comprises only about one tenth of the entirety of Draft Number 27. TABLE OF CONTENTS TLDR; EXECUTIVE SUMMARY Preamble (I) Introduction: This Crime Report is Written Under Duress (I)(A) Witness Tampering and the (Death?) Threats I Have Received (I)(B) The Christian Duty to Report Wrongdoing (I)(C) Key Witness, Analyst, Whistleblower, and Now Whistleblower x 2 (II) How Does the McDonald‚Äôs Frauds Scandal Compare to the Volkswagen Emissions Scandal: a Call For Equitable Accountability

item.title: FBI Assistant Director Donald Alway receives by email a first introduction about the criminal RICO case targeting McDonald‚Äôs Corporation
item.description: From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: LeBron James and criminal RICO case targeting McDonald’s Corporation Date sent: May 31, 2023, 21:42 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Donald Alway (Assistant Director in Charge, FBI) Cc: Vincent B. Le Corre My reference for this case: USA-v-McDonalds-pattern-of-racketeering-activity Dear Mr. Alway, My name is [REDACTED FOR PRIVACY]. I was born in [REDACTED FOR PRIVACY], on [REDACTED FOR PRIVACY]. I was notified on February 16, 2023, that the European Court of Human Rights (ECtHR) granted me anonymity.

item.title: My first communication, via LinkedIn, to Donald Alway, Assistant Director in Charge of the Los Angeles FBI Field Office
item.description: Click this link to see the original LinkedIn post. From: Vincent B. Le Corre Date sent: May 29, 2023, 08:50 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Donald Alway (Assistant Director in Charge, FBI) Dear Mr. Don Alway, thank you for sharing the message of Director Wray. I watched it with genuine interest. I sincerely hope the FBI doesn‚Äôt underestimate the harm done by white-collar criminals. Director Wray omitted to mention financial crime but financial crimes often end up causing very significant harm to society including lots of premature deaths.

item.title: Chris Kempczinski, CEO of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, is asked if Kevin Ozan‚Äôs departure is related to the criminal RICO case targeting them.
item.description: Click this link to see the original LinkedIn post. Dear Mr. Kempczinski, Is Mr. Ozan‚Äôs departure related to the criminal RICO case targeting McDonald’s Corporation and if yes, to which extent is it related? (look at the screenshot üëá to understand) You also mention Mr. Ozan‚Äôs ‚Äúunwavering integrity,‚Äù could you please confirm he reported internally my stern warnings about the crimes McDonald‚Äôs is engaging into? As the CFO, he obviously should have understood McDonald’s Corporation is engaging in money laundering, shouldn’t he?

item.title: Money laundering, 18 U.S.C. ¬ß 1957. Formal notice sent to Neuberger Berman‚Äôs CEO Mr. George Walker regarding McDonald‚Äôs Corporation
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-03-16_0042_0800_formal_notice_to_george_walker_neuberger_berman_with_email_Redacted.pdf KEY POINT OF THIS EMAIL: I formally notified Neuberger Berman that ‚ÄúNeuberger Berman has invested in a company which has engaged in a pattern of racketeering activity‚Äù and that therefore ‚ÄúNeuberger Berman is about to commit the crime of money laundering as defined in 18 U.S.C. ¬ß 1957 and the purpose of this communication is to try to alert [them] of what has happened so far in the McDonald‚Äôs RICO case.

item.title: Email to Adam Rogalski and Mahonri Manjarrez regarding the phone call incident to the FBI
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-02-15_2333_0800_email_to_adam_rogalski_and_mahonri_manjarrez_Redacted.pdf From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: FBI hanging up on me Date sentÔºö2023-02-15 23:33 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist) Cc: U.S. Ambassador Burns, U.S. Ambassador Bauer, Edward Lehman, David K. Colapinto, Yves Strickler (I will try to update this section soon) BeijingACS@state.gov and ParisExec@state.gov, please forward this email to the Legal Attach√©.

item.title: Phone call to the FBI Victim Services
item.description: On February 15, 2023, I tried to call a phone number I found on an FBI brochure related to the FBI Victim Services. The phone number was (202)-324-3000. But the FBI operator hanged up on me. After the FBI informed me the FBI was recording the phone call, I informed the operator that I was also recording the phone call and he disagreed so he hanged up. To gain a clearer understanding of the sequence of events in this case, I invite you to view a detailed timeline at the following link:

item.title: Email sent on 2022-05-12 to the F.B.I. and CCed to the U.S. Ambassadors to France and to China
item.description:
Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2022-05-12_2320_0800_I_shared_a_folder_with_the_FBI_containing_evidence.pdf

On 2022-05-12, I sent an email to the F.B.I. and CCed it to Denise BAUER, U.S. Ambassador to France, and Nicholas BURNS, U.S. Ambassador to China.

FROM : Vincent B. Le Corre

TO : Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

CC : Denise Bauer (U.S. Ambassador), Nicholas Burns (U.S. Ambassador), [REDACTED: the email was CCed to three additional people]

SUBJECT: I shared a folder with the FBI containing evidence

DATE: 2022-05-12 at 23:20 +0800 (China Standard Time)

item.title: Whistle-blower asking the F.B.I. if they received and kept the emails which were sent in 2015 and if they ever launched a criminal investigation against McDonald‚Äôs Corporation
item.description:
On 2022-04-20, I sent an email to the F.B.I. to ask them if they ever received the emails I sent them back in 2015 regarding the major case targeting McDonald‚Äôs Corporation.

I also ask the F.B.I. if they ever launched a criminal investigation targeting the transnational criminal enterprise.

FROM : Vincent B. Le Corre

TO : Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

SUBJECT: Has the FBI ever received the emails I sent in 2015?

item.title: Email sent to Adam ROGALSKI (State Department, FBI) and Mahonri MANJARREZ (FBI) in which I give examples of the serious frauds the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald‚Äôs Corporation and/or its affiliated companies committed.
item.description:
Click on this link to visualize the original email: 3-concrete-examples-of-aggravated-frauds.pdf

Key point of this event: the F.B.I. is now formally notified of some of the crimes I am accusing McDonald‚Äôs Corporation and/or its subsidiary companies of.

On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the third email which was sent at 19:38 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez.

From: Vincent B. Le Corre

To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

Subject:: 3 concrete examples of aggravated frauds

Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2022-03-11_1636_0800_FBI_XiJinping_fr_and_LiKeqiang_org.pdf

On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the second email which was sent at 16:36 China Standard Time. It was sent to Mr. Rogalski and Mr. Manjarrez. It’s about the XiJinping.fr and LiKeqiang.org websites.

From: Vincent B. Le Corre

item.title: Email received from Assistant Legal Attach√© Adam Rogalski ‚Äì one of the FBI representatives in Beijing
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2021-09-20_1612_0800_reply-from-assistant-legal-attache-adam-rogalski-fbi.pdf On 2021-09-20, I receive for the first time an email from Assistant Legal Attach√© Adam Rogalski, ‚Äúone of the FBI representatives in Beijing.‚Äù FROM : Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department) TO : Vincent B. Le Corre SUBJECT: Request to contact FBI office in Beijing Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2021-09-20_1612_0800_reply-from-assistant-legal-attache-adam-rogalski-fbi.pdf Mr. Le Corre, Good afternoon. I‚Äôm Assistant Legal Attach√© Adam Rogalski ‚Äì one of the FBI representatives in Beijing.

item.title: Email received from FBI language specialist Mahonri MANJARREZ on September 08, 2021.
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2021-09-08_2235_0800_reply-from-fbi-mahonri-manjarrez.pdf Email received from Mahonri MANJARREZ (F.B.I.) on September 08, 2021. FROM : Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist) TO : Vincent B. Le Corre SUBJECT: Re: [EXTERNAL EMAIL] - carteconsulaire.png Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2021-09-08_2235_0800_reply-from-fbi-mahonri-manjarrez.pdf Good afternoon, Mr. Le Corre. This is indeed the right email address. Thank you for reaching out to our office. If you wish to report a crime, please proceed to email me the information you have at your disposal.

item.title: Transcript of the phone conversation with the FBI‚Äôs Field Office of Chicago
item.description: Transcript of the phone conversation between me and the FBI‚Äôs Field Office of Chicago. I called them on December 23, 2015, at 20:30 +0800 (China Standard Time).

item.title: F.B.I. Chicago answers the victim asking him to please contact the FBI's Public Access Line
item.description:
On 2015-12-18, I receive an answer from the Intake Unit of the Field Office of the F.B.I. in Chicago.

FROM : Chicago@ic.fbi.gov

To: Vincent B. Le Corre

SUBJECT: RE: McDonald’s massive fraud in Europe

item.title: Email sent to the F.B.I. Washington Field Office on December 16, 2015. McDonald‚Äôs Corporation.
item.description:
This email was sent to the F.B.I. Washington D.C. Field Office on December 16, 2015 at 15:00 Beijing time.

FROM : [Whistle-blower‚Äôs email address] Visit X-v-France.com for more information about me

TO : washington.field@ic.fbi.gov

SUBJECT: McDonald‚Äôs massive fraud in Europe
